颾颾颾

颾字的基本解释

颾
sāo
风声。

颾
sōu
古同“飕”。

颾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sāo］
［《廣韻》蘇遭切，平豪，心。］
(1)象声词。形容风声。参见“颾颾”。
(2)风凛冽貌。参见“颾颾”。
(3)衰老貌。

颾字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【風字部】　颾； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1414第08
【廣韻】【集韻】蘇遭切【韻會】【正韻】蘇曹切，?音騷。【廣韻】風聲。又【集韻】疎鳩切。與䬒同。颾飋，風也。　又先到切，音喿。義同。

颾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
颾字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Numb
sāo
Wind.
Numb
sōu
The ancient same "swish".
Numb
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sāo]
["Guangyun" Su Zuoqie, Pinghao, Xin. ]
(1) Onomatopoeia. Describe the wind. See also "颾颾".
(2) Windy appearance. See also "颾颾".
(3) Aging appearance.
Numb
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Feng Zi Department】　颾; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1414 to 08
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] Su Zuoqie [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Su Cao Qi,? Yin Sao. [Guangyun] The sound of wind. Also 【Jiyun】Nine dove cuts. Same as 䬒.颾飋, the wind is also.　Cut first again, the sound. The same meaning.
